title: 30 Affordable Gifts, Courtesy of Amazon’s Fall Prime Day Event
description: All smart shoppers know right now is the best time stock up on presents.
excerpt: Yes, this is the best time to stock up on presents, including treats for yourself.
text: Valentina Valdinoci//LAUNCHMETRICS SPOTLIGHTLet’s be honest: Shopping on Amazon can be overwhelming. The mega-retailer has rightfully earned its nickname, “the everything store.” But with a seemingly endless assortment of stuff (some not so great), it can be frustrating to navigate the digital aisles, especially if you’re looking for a last-minute gift to give someone. Ideally, you’ll want something that can impress the receiver without breaking the bank. Oh, and two-day free shipping doesn’t hurt either, right? Well, after spending hours browsing pages upon pages, I’ve found just that, and—what’s even better—every item is on sale, thanks to Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days. “What’s that,” you ask? Think of it as a second round of Prime Day-level savings. Brands are slashing the prices on everything, from pretty little dresses by Staud to athlete-approved Hoka sneakers. If you’re feeling generous and looking for something to give to a special person in your life, I’ve unearthed 30 gifts that will not disappoint.For the Women in Your LifeIlycase Velvet Jewelry BoxNow 50% OffSumrains Woven Satchel & Crossbody BagNow 20% OffHermès Eau Des MerveillesNow 48% OffOuai Medium Shampoo + Conditioner SetYimoon Embroidered Scarf Jacket With FringeCharlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Lip Secrets Holiday SetDream Paris Suede Classic Platform BootsNow 19% OffLovenfold Flowers for Delivery with PrimeNow 16% OffGucci Pre-Loved Brown GG WalletNow 45% OffUse code ELLEPD250 for $250 off.Lele Sadoughi Blossom EarringsNow 55% OffJLo Beauty That JLo Essentials KitNow 20% OffBtfbm Cardigans SweaterCoach Soho Denim BagNow 30% OffVera Wang Princess Eau de Toilette SprayHerald Puffer Tote BagNow 20% OffApple Watch SE (2nd Generation)Now 32% OffHydro Flask 40 Oz TumblerNow 40% OffDyson AirwrapFor the Men in Your LifeViking Revolution Colonia HombreZigzagger Slip On Moccasin SlippersNow 54% OffApple AirPods Max HeadphonesNow 28% OffRalph Lauren Fragrances Polo Eau de ToiletteCQR All Cotton Flannel ShirtMATEIN Business Laptop BackpackNow 26% OffNautica Long-Sleeve Lightweight Cotton Woven RobeNow 53% OffManscaped The Lawn Mower® 5.0 Ultra TrimmerNextboom Inc. Self-Heating Coffee MugNow 23% OffTheraGun Handheld Percussion Massage GunNow 20% OffAssouline Italian Chic - Assouline Coffee Table BookS-ZONE Oversized Leather Canvas DuffelNow 44% OffAlexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
html:
Let’s be honest: Shopping on Amazon can be overwhelming. The mega-retailer has rightfully earned its nickname, “the everything store.” But with a seemingly endless assortment of stuff (some not so great), it can be frustrating to navigate the digital aisles, especially if you’re looking for a last-minute gift to give someone. Ideally, you’ll want something that can impress the receiver without breaking the bank. Oh, and two-day free shipping doesn’t hurt either, right?

Well, after spending hours browsing pages upon pages, I’ve found just that, and—what’s even better—every item is on sale, thanks to Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days. “What’s that,” you ask? Think of it as a second round of Prime Day-level savings. Brands are slashing the prices on everything, from pretty little dresses by Staud to athlete-approved Hoka sneakers.

If you’re feeling generous and looking for something to give to a special person in your life, I’ve unearthed 30 gifts that will not disappoint.

For the Women in Your Life

Ilycase Velvet Jewelry Box

Now 50% Off

Sumrains Woven Satchel & Crossbody Bag

Now 20% Off

Now 48% Off

Now 20% Off

Assouline Italian Chic - Assouline Coffee Table Book

S-ZONE Oversized Leather Canvas Duffel

Now 44% Off

Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
